populate

public void populate(java.lang.Object jaxbobject)
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Populate the component with configuration data.

Called once by ObjectFactory.createAndLoadScenario(java.lang.String). It is passed a JAXB object with data loaded from the configuration file. Use this function to populate and initialize all fields in the component.

Specified by:
populate in interface InterfaceComponent
Overrides:
populate in class Sensor
Parameters:
jaxbobject - Object

validate

public void validate()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Validate the component.

Called once by ObjectFactory.createAndLoadScenario(java.lang.String). It checks the validity of the configuration parameters. Events are validated at their activation time. All other components are validated when the scenario is loaded.

Specified by:
validate in interface InterfaceComponent
Overrides:
validate in class Sensor

reset

public void reset()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Prepare the component for simulation.

Called by Scenario.run(edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator.SimulationSettings, java.util.Properties) each time a new simulation run is started. It is used to initialize the internal state of the component.

Because events are state-less, the Event class provides a default implementation of this method, so it need not be implemented by other event classes.

Specified by:
reset in interface InterfaceComponent
Overrides:
reset in class Sensor

update

public void update()
Description copied from interface: InterfaceComponent
Update the state of the component.

Called by Scenario.run(edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator.SimulationSettings, java.util.Properties) at each simulation time step. This function updates the internal state of the component.

Because events are state-less, the Event class provides a default implementation of this method, so it need not be implemented by other event classes.

Specified by:
update in interface InterfaceComponent
Overrides:
update in class Sensor
